name: Social Association for Nurturing. Knitting and Linking Peopleâ€¦(SANKALP)
briefDescription: S.A.N.K.A.L.P formed in 1997 an Indian registered Society by a youth group, who decided to implement and support real grassroots initiatives concern with environment protection, skill development, livelihoods improvement, health and education and taken a committed to open the door for a better world for the coming generations.
